00013 typedef struct
00014 {
00015         uint8_t class_base;             
00016         uint8_t class_sub;              
00017         uint8_t prog_if;                
00018         char *desc_base;                
00019         char *desc_sub;                 
00020         char *desc_prog;                
00021         char file[32];                  
00022 } pci_classtable_t;
